attributes.title: Isle of Mull Brewery
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

Started brewing at the beginning of May 2005 with a 5 barrel plant behind MacGochans Bar in Tobermory.  Beers include McCaig's Folly and Galleon Gold.  There are plans to move to a custom-built brewery, also in Tobermory.
